items.question: Do I need an appointment?
items.answer: While we accept walk-ins when available, we highly recommend booking an appointment to guarantee your preferred time slot.

items.question: What forms of payment do you accept?
items.answer: We accept cash, all major credit cards, debit cards, and mobile payment options like Apple Pay and Google Pay.

items.question: How often should I get a haircut?
items.answer: Most men get haircuts every 3-4 weeks to maintain their style. Fades and shorter styles may need maintenance every 2-3 weeks.

items.question: What's included in a haircut?
items.answer: Every haircut includes consultation, precision cutting, hot towel treatment, scalp massage, styling, and product application. We also offer complimentary touch-ups within 2 weeks.

items.question: Do you offer beard grooming?
items.answer: Yes! We offer beard trims, shaping, hot towel treatments, and beard oil applications. Our barbers are experts in creating and maintaining all beard styles.

items.question: Can you do kids' haircuts?
items.answer: Absolutely! We specialize in patient, fun haircuts for children of all ages. We make it a positive experience with rewards and a friendly atmosphere.

items.question: How should I prepare for my appointment?
items.answer: No special preparation needed! Just arrive with clean, dry hair if possible. Bring photos of styles you like for reference.

items.question: Should I wash my hair before coming?
items.answer: Not necessary - we include a shampoo or hot towel treatment with most services. Come as you are!

items.question: What's your cancellation policy?
items.answer: We require 24-hour notice for cancellations or rescheduling. Late cancellations may be subject to a fee to respect our barbers' time.

items.question: Do you offer any memberships or packages?
items.answer: Yes! We offer monthly membership plans that include regular haircuts plus discounts on additional services. Ask your barber for details.
